name: FWEE
description:
An ambitious effort to make a procedurally generated platformer, where the player can collect various types of body parts of different elements (Fire, Water, Earth and Electric).

Developed in less than a week for #RainbowJam16.

The game is broken and unfinished, enjoy xoxo

Controls

A/D to move
Space to jump
Left click to left punch
Right click to right punch
Both click to special attack (not implemented)

CreditsProgrammers
